name: post-thoracotomy defects in the chest wall
description: Changes in the structure of the chest wall following surgery, typically involving the removal of part of the chest wall or a thoracotomy

attributes.name: location
attributes.description: The anatomical region of the chest wall where the surgery was performed

values.name: left
values.description: Left side of the chest wall

values.name: right
values.description: Right side of the chest wall

attributes.name: surgery type
attributes.description: The type of surgery that was performed on the chest wall

values.name: mastectomy
values.description: Surgical removal of one or both breasts

values.name: sternotomy
values.description: Surgical procedure that involves cutting through the sternum

values.name: thoracotomy
values.description: Surgical procedure that involves cutting into the chest wall

values.name: reconstruction
values.description: Surgical procedure to restore the appearance or function of the chest wall

attributes.name: abnormality
attributes.description: The presence or absence of additional abnormalities in the chest wall

name: post-thoracotomy defects in the chest wall
description: Changes in the chest wall following thoracotomy surgery

attributes.name: side
attributes.description: The side of the chest wall where the post-thoracotomy defects are located

values.name: left
values.description: Left side of the chest wall

values.name: right
values.description: Right side of the chest wall

attributes.name: presence of mass
attributes.description: The presence or absence of a mass in the chest wall

values.name: mass present
values.description: Presence of a mass in the chest wall

values.name: no mass
values.description: Absence of a mass in the chest wall

attributes.name: type of surgery
attributes.description: The type of surgery that resulted in the post-thoracotomy defects

values.name: mastectomy
values.description: Surgical removal of one or both breasts

values.name: thoracotomy
values.description: Surgical incision into the chest wall

attributes.name: presence of abnormalities
attributes.description: The presence or absence of abnormalities in the chest wall

values.name: abnormalities present
values.description: Presence of abnormalities in the chest wall

values.name: no abnormalities
values.description: Absence of abnormalities in the chest wall
